title: No. 1 Fledgling Chocobo Jockey
description: In Hustle de Chocobo at Bill’s Ranch in the Grasslands, beat 0:31.

title: No. 2 Soaring Chocobo Jockey
description: In the Cosmo Canyon Region, beat the top time in all three Glide de Chocobo Training Courses.

title: No. 3 Salientian Seal of Master
description: In Under Junon’s Jumpfrog, survive Whirligig Whack for over 1:20.

title: No. 4 Peerless Polliwog
description: In Under Junon’s Jumpfrog, survive Ribbiting Rollers for 1:20, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 5 Dolphin Stuntman
description: In Under Junon, complete the Dolphin Show course in under 1:40, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 6 Pride of the Condor Cavalry
description: In the Junon Region, win all four Hard Mode Fort Condor boards.

title: No. 7 Award for Outstanding Performance
description: In Chapter 4, finish the parade with 100,000 upvotes or more. This requires two formations to be at least Two Star difficulty and an almost perfect performance.

title: No. 8 Presidential Commendation
description: In Chapter 4, finish the parade.

title: No. 9 QB Tournament Champion
description: In Chapter 5, participate in the surprise exhibition match at the end of the Queen's Blood tournament.

title: No. 10 Buccaneer Blaster
description: In Costa del Sol’s Pirate’s Rampage, beat 15,000 points on the Brigantine stage.

title: No. 11 Pirate King’s Marksman
description: In Costa del Sol’s Pirate’s Rampage, beat 22,000 points on the Ghost Ship stage.

title: No. 12 Neophyte QB Strategian
description: In Costa del Sol’s Card Carnival, beat all seven card puzzles.

title: No. 13 Bloody Brilliant Card Sharp
description: In Costa del Sol’s Card Carnival, complete the Advanced Card Puzzles, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 14 Legendary Card Collector
description: In Costa del Sol’s Card Carnival, complete the Collection Challenges, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 15 Madder Machinator
description: In Costa del Sol’s Card Carnival, complete the Skill Drills, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 16 King of the Jungle
description: In Costa del Sol’s Run Wild, finish in 1st with no tie in Free-for-All.

title: No. 17 Red Bolt XIII
description: In Costa del Sol’s Run Wild, finish Time Trial in under 2:30.

title: No. 18 Ab-Fab
description: In the Corel Costline’s Training Gym, beat Jules in the Pro-Level Crunch-Off.

title: No. 19 Speedy Motorcyclist
description: In The Gold Saucer’s G-Bike, beat 30,000 points in the Standard course.

title: No. 20 Crazy Motorcyclist
description: In The Gold Saucer’s G-Bike, beat 31,000 points in the Expert course, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 21 Welterweight Brawler
description: In The Gold Saucer’s 3D Brawler, defeat all three standard opponents.

title: No. 22 Heavyweight Brawler
description: In The Gold Saucer’s 3D Brawler, defeat Ifrit, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 23 Super Heavyweight Brawler
description: In The Gold Saucer’s 3D Brawler, defeat Sephiroth, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 24 Rookie Ranger
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Galactic Saviors, beat 35,000 points in the Standard mission.

title: No. 25 SOLDIER: Galaxy Class
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Galactic Saviors, beat 45,000 points in the Expert mission, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 26 Chocobo Bug Boy
description: In Chapter 8, win the Chocobo Cup race for Gus.

title: No. 27 Fleet-footed Jockey
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Chocobo Square, win all Grade III races.

title: No. 28 Chocobo Whisperer
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Chocobo Square, win all Grade II races, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 29 Champion Jockey
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Chocobo Square, win the Gold Cup, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 30 Card Savant
description: In The Gold Saucer, beat all the Queen’s Blood Elementary Card Challenges.

title: No. 31 Card Whiz
description: In The Gold Saucer, beat all the Queen’s Blood Advanced Challenges, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 32 Card Slayer
description: In The Gold Saucer, beat all the Queen’s Blood Survival Challenges, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 33 Twin Muscleheads
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Musclehead Colosseum, win all “2 (Easy)” Challenges.

title: No. 34 The Six Musc-keteers
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Musclehead Colosseum, beat all “2 (Advanced)” Challenges, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 35 Twin Team Titans
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Musclehead Colosseum, win all “6 (Easy)” Challenges.

title: No. 36 The Six Muc-keteers
description: In The Gold Saucer’s Musclehead Colosseum, beat all “6 (Advanced)” Challenges, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 37 Best Actor: Cloud
description: S-Rank the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

title: No. 38 Best Actress: Tifa
description: S-Rank the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless with Tifa in the cast. This requires not having Yuffie, Barret or Red XII as your date, as she otherwise is not in the cast.

title: No. 39 Best Actress: Aerith
description: S-Rank the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

title: No. 40 Best Supporting Actor: Barret
description: S-Rank the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

title: No. 41 Best Actress: Yuffie
description: S-Rank the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless with Yuffie in the cast. This requires having her as your date in Chapter 12, as she otherwise is not in the cast.

title: No. 42 Best Supporting Animal: Red XIII
description: S-Rank the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

title: No. 43 Best Feline Narration: Cait Sith
description: S-Rank the Gold Saucer's Rendition of Loveless.

title: No. 44 Dustbowl Smasher
description: In The Dustbowl’s Desert Rush, beat 42,000 points in the Standard course.

title: No. 45 Dustbowl Demolisher
description: In The Dustbowl’s Desert Rush, beat 55,000 points in the Challenging course, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 46 Sylkis Cup Champion
description: In The Dustbowl’s Beast Battleground, beat all Sylkis Cup challenges.

title: No. 47 Prison Tourney Champion
description: In The Dustbowl’s Beast Battleground, beat all Prison Tourney challenges.

title: No. 48 Belles of the Ball
description: In The Dustbowl’s Beast Battleground, complete the Sand and Circuses Side Quest, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 49 1,000 Needle Pincushion
description: In the Corel Desert, complete all Cactuar Crush challenges on Normal Mode. Can only be done at the end of Chapter 12.

title: No. 50 10,000 Needle Pincushion
description: In the Corel Desert, complete all Cactuar Crush challenges on Hard Mode.

title: No. 51 Gambit Technician
description: In the Cosmo Canyon Region, complete all Gears and Gambits Challenges on Hard Mode.

title: No. 52 Adequately Functional Specimen
description: In the Nibel Region's Shinra Manor, complete all Preliminary Trial Challenges in the Shinra Combat Simulator, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 53 Somewhat Intriguing Specimen
description: In the Nibel Region's Shinra Manor, complete all Evaluation Combat Challenges in the Shinra Combat Simulator, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 54 MAI’s Participation Award
description: Complete all of Chadley’s Normal Combat Challenges in his simulator.

title: No. 55 MAI's Gold Star
description: Complete all of Chadley’s Brutal and Legendary Combat Challenges in his simulator.

title: No. 56 Peerless Pianist
description: Achieve A-Rank on the first six piano Sheet Music pieces, then talk to Dorian.

title: No. 57 Shutterbug Supreme
description: Complete all the Photo Challenges for Snaps.

title: No. 58 Blood Champion
description: Attain the highest possible rank in Queen’s Blood by beating the Shadowblood Queen.

title: No. 59 The True Ultimate Party Animal
description: In The Gold Saucer, complete the "Can't Stop Won't Stop" Side Quest, starting in Chapter 13.

title: No. 60 PLAY ARTS Rest Spot
description: Dig up with a Chocobo in the Grasslands.

title: No. 61 PLAY ARTS Sweeper
description: Dig up with a Chocobo in the Junon Region.

title: No. 62 PLAY ARTS Wheelie
description: Dig up with a Chocobo in the Corel Coastline.

title: No. 63 PLAY ARTS Buggy
description: Dig up with a Chocobo in the Gongaga Region.

title: No. 64 PLAY ARTS Tiny Bronco
description: Dig up with a Chocobo in the Cosmo Canyon Region.

title: No. 65 PLAY ARTS Shinra Box
description: Dig up with a Chocobo in the Nibel Region.

title: No. 66 Stuffed Moogle
description: Complete all Moogle Mischief minigames.

title: No. 67 Stuffed Stamp
description: In Chapter 4, survive the escape from Junon with all five 7th Infantry Troopers alive, then beat Roche.

title: No. 68 Stuffed Fat Moogle
description: In Chapter 11, score 10 or more in the box-throwing challenge in the elevator to Section S.

title: No. 69 Stuffed Bomb
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 70 Stuffed Chocobo
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 71 Stuffed Cactuar
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 72 Stuffed Fat Chocobo
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 73 Stuffed Tonberry
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 74 Space Ranger PLAY ARTS Figure
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 75 PLAY ARTS Starfighter
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 76 PLAY ARTS G-Bike
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 77 Queen’s Blood Gameboard
description: At The Gold Saucer, win all the Easy Queen’s Blood matches, then buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 78 3D Brawler Cloud Figurine
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 79 3D Brawler Pugilist Figurine
description: At The Gold Saucer, beat Pugilist in 3D Brawler, then buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 80 3D Brawler Fat Moogle Figurine
description: At The Gold Saucer, beat Fat Moogle in 3D Brawler, then buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 81 3D Brawler Dio Figurine
description: At The Gold Saucer, beat Dio in 3D Brawler, then buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 82 3D Brawler Shiva Figurine
description: At The Gold Saucer, beat Shiva in 3D Brawler, then buy for 30 GP, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 83 3D Brawler Ifrit Figurine
description: At The Gold Saucer, beat Ifrit in 3D Brawler, then buy for 30 GP, starting in Chapter 12.

title: No. 84 Masamune Replica
description: At The Gold Saucer, complete the "Can't Stop Won't Stop" Side Quest in Chapter 13, beat Sephiroth in 3D Brawler, then buy for 2,000 GP.

title: No. 85 Dio's Autograph
description: At The Gold Saucer, win every challenge in the Musclehead Colosseum, then buy for 2,000 GP.

title: No. 86 ''Loveless'' Poster
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 87 Save Crystal
description: At The Gold Saucer, buy for 30 GP.

title: No. 88 - Rufus Shinra Cutout
description: In Chapter 4, take a good picture of the green Riot Team during “No I in Team”. They’re outside on the street, close to the Item and Materia shops.
